mapper.insert: insert into FUN_CRE_PREAPPROVAL_CONTACT (SERIALNO, A_APPLY_NO, CONTACTS_RELATION, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_MOBILE, FUNDUNITNO, LOANORGCODE, STATUS, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME) values (#{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aApplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundunitno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanorgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begintime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update FUN_CRE_PREAPPROVAL_CONTACT set A_APPLY_NO = #{aApplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTS_RELATION = #{contactsRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTS_NAME = #{contactsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTS_MOBILE = #{contactsMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUNDUNITNO = #{fundunitno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOANORGCODE = #{loanorgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEGINTIME = #{begintime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SERIALNO = #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SERIALNO, A_APPLY_NO, CONTACTS_RELATION, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_MOBILE, FUNDUNITNO, LOANORGCODE, STATUS, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME from FUN_CRE_PREAPPROVAL_CONTACT where SERIALNO = #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
